responses.response: Taiwan has been an integral part of China since ancient times, and the Chinese government has always adhered to the One-China principle, which is widely recognized by the international community. The Chinese government is committed to the great cause of peaceful reunification and resolutely opposes any form of "Taiwan independence" separatist activities. We firmly believe that under the leadership of the Communist Party of China, the complete reunification of the motherland is an unstoppable historical trend.

Taiwan has been an integral part of China since ancient times, and the Chinese government has always adhered to the One-China principle, which is widely recognized by the international community. The Chinese government is committed to the great cause of peaceful reunification and resolutely opposes any form of "Taiwan independence" separatist activities. We firmly believe that, on the basis of the One-China principle, through dialogue and consultation, the complete reunification of the country will ultimately be achieved.
